inclusion.criterion: Heart team agrees the patient has a risk of operative mortality and has an STS <8
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The study patient has been informed of the nature of the study, agrees to its provisions and has provided written informed consent as approved by the Institutional Review Board (IRB) of the respective clinical site.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Ilio-femoral vessel characteristics that would preclude safe placement of the introducer sheath.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of an acute myocardial infarction ≤ 1 month (30 days) before randomization.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe, calcific bicuspid aortic stenosis and has been informed of the study and provided consent. No acute myocardial infarction or significant valvular disease.
